question: Your next-door neighbors like to listen to music late at night. Because of the loud music, you often lose sleep.Write a letter to the building manager. In your letter-describe the situation-explain the problems it is causing you-offer at least one solution
text: I have been living in this apartment building for almost six years now. As you know I have always been a good tenant. I am writing this letter to you because I have a problem with my neighbour.

Lately, Ms Ann moved into apartment Block A Room.211, right next door to me. She tends to enjoy listening to music late at night ,especially after midnight. The music was very loud and I could easily hear it in my bedroom. It made it very difficult for me to fall asleep. I have to get up at 6 A.M. in order to get to work on time. However, I told her about her noise but she acted rude manner to me that is the worst neighbour I have ever seen.
I would like you to remind her again about the building regulations and post the rules notice in front of the corridor that all the tenants of this floor can see.
Thanks in advance for giving the matter your attention.
